settings.title:
Need help?
We’re here to save the day!

settings.question: What product should I buy?
settings.answer: The Enhanced Canvas Pro is about convenience. This sneaker features a sock-like upper that offers a snug fit and no-tie laces for easy on and off. If you prefer traditional laces, we’ve got you covered with an extra pair included. The canvas fabric on this footwear has been specially developed by us. With suede and leather overlays, the Enhanced Canvas Pro stands out. It comes in three colours, each with a gum sole and a red detail for a pop of colour. Whether you’re on the go or just taking it easy, these footwear move with you and keep you comfortable.

settings.question: When will I receive my order?
settings.answer:
Delivery times vary by pin code. For metro cities, it’s usually 5 working days. Tier 1 and 2 cities typically take 5-7 days, and other areas may take up to 7 days. However, around 93% of orders are delivered in under 5 days across all pin codes.

Please note, there’s an additional 1 business day for order preparation and dispatch.

settings.question: Can I pay via cash on delivery (COD)?
settings.answer: Yes, you can! COD is available for most pincodes across India. In some cases, it may be unavailable for certain pin codes due to operational issues, but our customer support team will be happy to assist you with a solution.

settings.question: Where can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order is processed and shipped, we’ll send the tracking details to you via email and WhatsApp. Alternatively, you can track your order directly here (Link).

settings.question: How do I exchange/return an order?
settings.answer:
We’ve kept exchanges and returns simple and clear with these four steps: Request, Ship, Shipment Received, and Refund.

1. Request
If you’re not fully satisfied with your purchase, you can request an exchange or return within 7 days of receiving it. Just go to our returns page, enter your order number and the email or phone number you used at checkout, and select the item(s) you’d like to exchange or return. Our delivery partner will pick up the item within 5-7 working days, and all updates will be sent via email or WhatsApp.

Note: FRAGRANCES, THE SPORT BAG and CAP are not eligible for exchange or return, except in the case of damage upon receipt

2. Ship
Please make sure that the items are unused, in their original packaging, and with the return tag intact. Apparel should be returned unwashed, with all labels still attached.

3. Shipment Received
Once we receive your returned item, we’ll process it as quickly as possible and notify you by email or WhatsApp once it’s done.

4. Refund
Your refund will be credited back to your original payment method within 7 working days.

For any questions, feel free to contact our customer support team!
